tool_description:
Rebirth your articles with impeccable structure and flow. It has OpenI API support in the background.
Look no further than PhoenixInk, the transformative API designed to help you achieve remarkable articles with flawless structure and seamless flow. 
As the legendary phoenix rises from its ashes, PhoenixInk empowers you to resurrect your writing, infusing it with captivating elegance and clarity.
name: PhoenixInk
title: PhoenixInk

api_list.name: summarize
api_list.description: By using this method, your text will be summarized.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://phoenixink1.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phoenixink1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://phoenixink1.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phoenixink1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
